Package jalse.listeners

This package provides listeners and events for AttributeContainer and EntityContainer.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AttributeListener<T>
    Listener for AttributeType value manipulation.
    EntityListener
    Listener for Entity creation and death.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttributeAdapter<T>
    An abstract adapter for AttributeListener.
    AttributeEvent<T>
    Attribute change event for AttributeListener.
    EntityAdapter
    An abstract adapter for EntityListener.
    EntityEvent
    Entity change event for EntityListener.
    Listeners
    A utility for Event listener related functionality.
    ListenerSet<T>
    Provides a thread-safe way to store and process listeners.

Package jalse.listeners Description

This package provides listeners and events for AttributeContainer and EntityContainer. There are recursive AttributeListener and EntityListener suppliers for newly created Entity under Listeners.
See Also:
EntityAdapter, AttributeAdapter, ListenerSet
